title: CHF vs BKT Steam

embed.description: CHF vs BKT | IWC Turkey - Group Stage Day 1 | Chiefs eSports vs Bangkok Titans | 2015 International Wildcard Esports TV | LOL Tournament | League of Legends league Welcome to League of Legends Tournaments ************************************ Thank you for visiting our Youtube Channel ..... Please SUBCRIBE if you liked our video.

body: What happened to the stream? There was a lot of pauses and then the stream just ended.

replies.body: 7 pauses now.... Apparently about 5 mins of pause time left. Gee what a riveting and awesome stream >.>
At least we get an in-depth guide  on every single thing that happens in the game xD
Nah man it's over. They ended the stream and are going to remake the game 'at a future date'.

Yeah just saw. How can they make it at a future date. That's implying could be next week. It's like nah dw guys everyone fly home halfway across the world. sorry for the mess around.. Why is it even in Turkey anyway?
And we have a remake XD, the remake will play tomorrow. Too bad for chief :/

So far the games been going for about 13 minutes, but about 35 mins of pause time spread over 3-4 pauses so far padding that out. Currently it is paused yet again.

Fricking annoying.

Edit: This stream is still up btw www.twitch.tv/riotgames2
Does anyone know what the exact problem is? At least we should know what it is -_-
